price: 9. Mpe nayebisaki bango na polele mpe na lolenge ya kobombama.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
